description: This file defines a React component for a login page within a role-based access control admin system. It manages user authentication through email and password, handling form state, validation, and navigation post login.

methods.name: LoginPage()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the login form and manages authentication state.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission that performs login action asynchronously, handles navigation, and displays error messages.
